errors.error_description: Installation command contains excessive and potentially problematic pip flags that could cause installation issues
correction_candidates: Use simple 'pip install qibo' command without additional flags
Remove --user flag and keep other optimization flags
Use 'pip install qibo --upgrade' with only the upgrade flag
Replace with 'conda install -c conda-forge qibo' for better dependency management
errors.golden_answer: Use simple 'pip install qibo' command without additional flags
